00041         class PEAux;    // forward declaration - hidden implementation of physics engine

00048         public:
00049                 Engine();
00050                 ~Engine();

00059                 void    SetCollisionCallback(ICallback* pCB);
00060 
00061                 //----------------------- Factory
00062 
00069                 uint32  AddRigidBodyPlane(PMath::Plane& plane);
00070                 uint32  AddRigidBodySphere(Real radius);
00071 
00079                 bool    RemoveRigidBody(uint32 id);
00080 
00081                 void    RemoveAll();

00083                 //----------------------- Set/Get RigidBody Properties
00084 
00085                 enum ERigidBodyBool             { propActive, propUseGravity, propCollidable, propSpinnable, propTranslatable };
00086                 enum ERigidBodyScalar   { propAngularVelocityDamp, propLinearVelocityDamp, propMass };
00087                 enum ERigidBodyVector   { propDimensions, propPosition, propVelocity };
00088                 enum ERigidBodyQuat     { propOrientation };
00089 
00090                 //----------------------- Set/Get Functions
00091 
00092                 void                            SetRigidBodyBool                        (uint32 id, ERigidBodyBool              prop,   bool value);

00104

00110 
00111                 bool    RemoveSpring(uint32 id);
00112 
00113                 enum ESpringBool        { propSpringCompressible };     // if true, the spring will push if compressed, and pull if stretched. If false it will only pull if stretched.
00114                 enum ESpringScalar      { propSpringStiffness, propSpringDamping, propSpringRestLength };
00115                 enum ESpringVector      { propAttachPointA, propAttachPointB };
00116                 enum ESpringUint32      { propBodyA, propBodyB };
00117

00119                 bool                            GetSpringBool                           (uint32 id, ESpringBool                 prop);
00120                 void                            SetSpringUInt32                         (uint32 id, ESpringUint32               prop,   uint32 value);
00121                 uint32                          GetSpringUInt32                         (uint32 id, ESpringUint32               prop);
00122                 void                            SetSpringScalar                         (uint32 id, ESpringScalar               prop,   Real value);
00123                 Real                            GetSpringScalar                         (uint32 id, ESpringScalar               prop);

00125                 PMath::Vec3f*           GetSpringVec3fPtr                       (uint32 id, ESpringVector               prop);
00126 
00127                 //----------------------- Force inputs during a frame
00128

00131 
00135                 void    SetGravity      (PMath::Vec3f val);

00138                 void    AddTwist        (uint32 id, PMath::Vec3f twist);                                                                // add twist (instantaneous torque)
